name: Complete 1 KANJI by rotating and sorting images.
name_original: Complete 1 KANJI by rotating and sorting images.
description:
Please complete 1 KANJI letter while rotating and sorting each of the 4 divided images..
There are three game types below. Select according to the purpose.^^

1, Training Mode
It is a self-study mode that continues to answer questions.

2, Challenge Mode
It is a battle mode that ranks by consecutive correct answer counts.

3, Time Attack Mode
It is a battle mode that ranks by answer time of 10 questions.　

There are two ranks in their own device rank and world rank.
I think you will be No. 1.^^

For details, please see the support URL.
Thank you!
